tests.name: Brace groups share the parent scope
tests.description: Assignments inside { ... } should affect the surrounding environment.

tests.name: Command substitutions run in subshells
tests.description: Variables set inside $(...) must not leak into the caller.

tests.name: Pipelines spawn subshells
tests.description: Variables mutated inside a pipeline while-loop should not persist afterwards.

tests.name: Pager forced in pipeline
tests.description: Forces more to run with injected input so pipeline paging stays in-process without a TTY.

tests.name: Functions mutate globals without local
tests.description: Without the local keyword, functions should update the surrounding scope.

tests.name: For loop variable remains set
tests.description: Loop variables should be visible after the loop completes, mirroring bash.
